comment._content: Explorer, in New York to raise funds for his expeditions, died when the Lusitania was torpedoed by the Germans on May 7, 1915. www.rmslusitania.info/people/saloon/joseph-foster-stackho...

comment._content:
artolog:

Thanks for the info on Commander Stackhouse. What a tragic ending !  We will add more details about him to the record.
